alert.M1.div: Metadata Set Identifier element required (element cardinality is [1])

warning.M1.div: Warning: It is strongly recommended to provide a unique identifier or a locator. Suggestions: Use a UUID, a URI or URL

warning.M2.1.div: Warning: This element is mandatory if an upper-level hierarchy exists, typically if a dataset pertains to a dataset series. Suggestions: This refers to the metadata set identifier of the resource to which this resource is a subset (child).

warning.M2.2.div: Warning: It is strongly recommended to provide a unique identifier or a locator. Suggestions: Use a UUID, a URI or URL

alert.M3.div: Metadata Language (MDLANG) element required (element cardinality is [1])

alert.M4.div: Metadata Character Set (MDCSET) element required (the value of the element is fixed to utf8)

alert.M5.1.div: Metadata Point Of Contact element required (NGMP mandates at least one instance of contact having pointOfContact as role; instances having a different role are out of NGMP scope)

alert.M5.2.div: At least one of the Organization Name, Party Name and Party Position has to be provided, with a priority to the Organization Name

alert.M6.1.div: Metadata Standard Title element required (the value of the element is fixed to STANAG 2586)

alert.M6.2.div: Metadata Standard Version element required (the value of the element is fixed to Edition 1)

alert.M7.div: Metadata Classification Level element required if Metadata Classification System element is set

alert.M8.div: Metadata Classification System (MDCSYS) element required if Metadata Classification Level (MDCLVL) element is set

alert.M9.1.div: Organization Name element required if Metadata Releasibility Addressee is set

alert.M9.2.div: Organization Role element required if Metadata Releasibility Addressee is set(the value of the element is fixed to user)

alert.M15.1.div: Resource Type element required (RSTYPE); dataset and dataset series are the only types of resources in the scope of STANAG 2586

alert.M15.2.div: Only the first instance of Resource Type (RSTYPE) element is in the scope of STANAG 2586)

strings.M16: Resource Sheet Name (RSSHNA), Resource NRN Nation (RSNRNN) and Resource NSN Nation (RSNSNN)

warning.M16.1.div: Warning Suggestions: 1) Mandated if Resource National Reference Number (RSNRN) element is set; the value of Resource NRN Nation (RSNRNN) element is a 3-character country code (STANAG 1059) following "NRN:"; 2) Mandated if Resource National Stock Number (RSNSN) element is set; the value of Resource NSN Nation (RSNSNN) element is a 3-character country code (STANAG 1059) following "NSN:"); 3) Resource Sheet Name (RSSHNA) Code Space element must refer to Name of Resource Series (RSSERI) element

warning.M16.2.div: Warning Suggestions: Code Element required is Code Space Element is set.

alert.M17.div: RSCSET element required (default value is utf8)

strings.M18: Resource Equivalent Scale (RSSCALE) and Resource Ground Sample Distance (RSGSD)

alert.M18.div: At least one Resource Equivalent Scale (RSSCALE) or a Resource Ground Sample Distance (RSGSD) element shall be expressed for datasets

alert.M19.div: Geospatial Information Type (DGITYP) keyword element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_GeospatialInformationTypeCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M20.div: Resource Georeferencing Level (RSGFLV) keyword element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_GeoreferencingLevelCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M21.div: Resource Spatial Representation Type (RSPREF) keyword element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_RepresentationFormCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M22.div: Resource Data Level (RSDTLVL) keyword element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_DataLevelCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M23.div: Resource Thematic Keyword (RSKEYWD) element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_ThematicCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M24.div: Resource Thematic Baseline (RSBASLVL) keyword element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_BaselineLevelCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M25.div: Resource Designation Type (RSDESTP) keyword element must have thesaurus title set to 'NGMP_DesignationTypeCode', thesaurus date set to '2011-09-16' and thesaurus date type set to 'creation'

alert.M26.div: Resource Designation Type (RSDESTP) keyword element required (default value is otherGI and element cardinality is [1] )

alert.M27.div: Presence of Resource Designation Date (RSDESTD) element mandated when Resource Designation Authority (RSDESTA) element is set

alert.M28.1.div: Presence of Resource Designation Authority (RSDESTA) element mandated when Resource Designation Date(RSDESTD) element is set

alert.M28.2.div: Organisation Name (NGMP_CustodianCode) element and Role value equal to processor are required if Resource Designation Authority (RSDESTA)is set

alert.M29.div: Description element (the value of the element is fixed to Resource Designation) required when Resource Designation Authority (RSDESTA) and Date (RSDESTD) element are set

alert.M30.div: Resource Creation Date RSCDAT) element required (element cardinality is [1])

alert.M31.div: Resource Originating Country (RSONAT) element value must be a 3-character country code (STANAG 1059)

alert.M32.div: Resource Maintenance Frequency (RSMFRQ) element required (element cardinality is [1])

alert.M33.div: Resource Classification System (RSCSYS) element can not be set only if Resource Classification Level (RSCLVL) element is omitted

alert.M34.div: Resource Accessibility Level(RSACLV) element required (element cardinality is [1])

alert.M36.div: Specific Usage value equal to Recommended Display Projection, User Determined LimitationsSpecific Usage value equal to RSRDPRJ, Organisation Name element and Role value required when Recommended Display Projection(RSRDPRJ) element is set (Organisation Name element and Role value defaulted to undefined and user)

alert.M37.2.div: Name and Version elements are mandatory when Resource Distribution Format (RSDFMT) element is set

alert.M38.div: Custodian Code (NGMP_CustodianCode) element required when Resource Custodian(RSCUST) element is set

alert.M39.div: Linkage element required when Resource Online Location (RSONLLC) element is set

alert.M40.div: File Description element required when Resource Thumbnail (THUMB) element is set

warning.M41.div: Warning: Only one instance in the scope of NGMP. Suggestions: Resource Spatial Representation Type (RSRPTP) element describes the method used to spatially represent geographic information

alert.M42.div: Topic Category (RSTOPIC) element value must be in Topic Category Enumeration (default value is imageryBaseMapsEarthCover)
